name: places/ChIJaUMAk_BYwokRYGjkqWek16s
formattedAddress: 308 5th Ave 5th Floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 308 5th Ave 5th Floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: The experience from start to finish was amazing! Gigi was super helpful, friendly and an excellent advocate, she always took my phone calls and patiently answered all my questions. The staff as a whole was a pleasure to work with. Debbie made me feel comfortable during the procedure and help me relax. She was sweet, sympathetic and understanding. Dr. Mayer is an outstanding surgeon. He  not only was excellent clinically by eliminating my shoulder pain that multiple surgeons were unable to do, but post op he was there for me as well. The other surgeons all told me that I needed a major operation and there was no guarantees that it would eliminate my pain.  But Dr. Mayer cured me. Thank you so much Dr. Mayer!! I highly recommend everyone who has any joint pain to go to the National Stem Cell Centers and ask for Dr. Mayer.

originalText.text:
*** Astoria Location ***   Dr. Barnard, Gigi and the rest of the staff have been nothing but professional, empathetic, attentive and always with courteous manners. The  stem cell idea was something very new to me but because my immune system has been compromised I made the decision almost instantly to go ahead with this type of treatment. Why? because Dr. Barnard explained everything I needed to know for my specific situation and what the stem cells would have to offer my health and the benefits for the future. I can't say enough about how happy I am today for taking ti leap of faith. My health has been better, my energy has been better and overall functions and blood work have come back with normal levels. This small thank you isn't nearly enough for the big and amazing progress
I have experienced.

originalText.text:
I came here thinking I needed a hair transplant and was told about exosomes, a regenerative natural therapy. I did them 10 days ago and am astounded by the results so far. If I didn’t have photo documentation I wouldn’t even believe it!
Joseph’s love for what he does , combined with his consistent and thorough research in the field leaves me feeling confident that I’m working with the right person who takes a vested interest in my results. He is ,also, excellent with his follow up.
Christine assisted and is smooth as silk at drawing blood and has a calming touch which was appreciated during the treatment.
I am feeling very optimistic that my hair can be saved,

originalText.text: I have been to both the Great Neck and NYC locations.  The team goes above and beyond, its been almost 2 months and they still keep tabs on me. I received PRP injections for two sports injuries I had, they have the best quality stuff with the most advanced science in this field.  I have been through this before with 4 Orthopedists who did not help at all. Special thank you to Pam, Dr. Joseph and Dr. Barnard I am so happy I've found you guys.

originalText.text: I was facing knee and hip surgery, I decided to have this therapy and now I am pain free and the quality of my life has greatly improved! Best decision I have ever made.  How amazing that your very own body can heal it self with the help of stem cell therapy! If you are thinking about this therapy, book your appointment now, you will thank yourself later!
